lead_paragraph: Barcelona held a final day of respect for Johan Cruyff on Tuesday, remembering the Dutch soccer great who is largely credited with reinvigorating the club and helping launch its modern winning era.

headline.print_headline: Barcelona Holds Last Day of Memorial Tribute to Johan Cruyff
headline.main: Barcelona Holds Last Day of Memorial Tribute to Johan Cruyff
